pr_title: [2.31] Avoid "SELECT * FROM TABLE" when fetching metadata

timeline.message: wip: propagate pagination info to queryService
wip: add check for persisted filter only

timeline.bodyText: Could we call this class just Pagination ? More concise, if not already taken.
timeline.author: larshelge
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,74 @@

+package org.hisp.dhis.query;
+
+/**
+ * Simple POJO containing the pagination directive from the HTTP Request
+ * 
+ * @author Luciano Fiandesio
+ */
+public class PaginationData

replies.bodyText: We also already have class Pager, could we reuse?
replies.author: larshelge

replies.bodyText: I wasn't able to reuse the Pager object, since it expects also the total number of pages in order to function. It would have been a lot of changes in the logic to adapt it to become a simple object to send data from the front-end to the backend
replies.author: luciano-fiandesio

timeline.bodyText: Rename to instance? Perhaps a bit more standard and consistent e.g. with DataQueryParams.
timeline.author: larshelge

replies.bodyText: Renamed to newBuilder(), same as DataQueryParams
replies.author: luciano-fiandesio
